resources.string: You can turn noise cancelling back on by pressing the Noise Control button on the left ear cup.

This product is provided \'AS IS\', the developer makes no warranties, accepts no liability, and hereby disclaims any implied warranties, including any warranty of merchantability and warranty of fitness for a particular purpose.

This software sends a signal to the device you choose. This has only been tested on one specific pair of headphones of a single firmware version. You accept liability for whatever happens, including any damage, injury, or loss.
Quick link to turn noise cancelling off
Noise cancelling off is not available
